title: im really getting annoyed...
body:
if someone could go to my most recent game at na.op.gg and tell me what i did wrong to not get S. Thanks! I would think carrying and ganking so much would get an S but i guess farming jg whole game gets S so ok
btw the game is with me as lee and im 9/1/14

replies.body:
Hello Summoner! 

It seems a large factor in why youre unable to achieve the desired S rank is your Cs and Kda. 
Due to how the mastery system compares you with other Lee Sin players, it requires you to achieve a very high Kda and Cs count.

I hope you get that S rank soon!

> [{quoted}](name=Ironfield,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5xIwqQep,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-11-09T02:56:55.614+0000)
>
> Hello Summoner! 
> 
> It seems a large factor in why youre unable to achieve the desired S rank is your Cs and Kda. 
> Due to how the mastery system compares you with other Lee Sin players, it requires you to achieve a very high Kda and Cs count.
> 
> I hope you get that S rank soon!

thanks, but my kda was so high and cs was a bit average. I would think kda would be a factor if i had less cs because i ganked a lot. Thanks tho

> [{quoted}](name=Kimlop,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5xIwqQep,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-11-09T03:25:56.301+0000)
>
> thanks, but my kda was so high and cs was a bit average. I would think kda would be a factor if i had less cs because i ganked a lot. Thanks tho

Im sorry to say but 9 kills and 14 assists is not enough for a 33 minute game. The mastery system account both cs and kda and cannot recognize a lower cs score because of constant ganks therefore you need a high cs score and kda.

> [{quoted}](name=Ironfield,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5xIwqQep,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-11-09T03:34:41.085+0000)
>
> Im sorry to say but 9 kills and 14 assists is not enough for a 33 minute game. The mastery system account both cs and kda and cannot recognize a lower cs score because of constant ganks therefore you need a high cs score and kda.

9 kills and 14 assists isnt enough. lol. just lol.
i guess im just really pissed cause i need one more token for lvl 6 lee and rito keeps trolling me D:

Just wait till you finally get your level 6, and then on your way to 7, you get bombarded with S- grades.

Really tilt-inducing, I tell ya. Been there and done that. But I do wish you good luck next time.

> [{quoted}](name=Cancerous Lulu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5xIwqQep,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-11-09T04:06:48.771+0000)
>
> Just wait till you finally get your level 6, and then on your way to 7, you get bombarded with S- grades.
> 
> Really tilt-inducing, I tell ya. Been there and done that. But I do wish you good luck next time.

thx :D. glad im not the only one. lol

The game takes the averages and compares your game to how people averagely do.

I've also seen it takes that and also compares with how well your teammates did as well, so that might be it, not too sure.

> [{quoted}](name=A Bloo Banana,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=5xIwqQep,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-09T02:33:49.849+0000)
>
> The game takes the averages and compares your game to how people averagely do.
> 
> I've also seen it takes that and also compares with how well your teammates did as well, so that might be it, not too sure.

well jayce got a B+ with 10/2 and decent farm. Also, the enemy ez was going good. Also, i ganked so many times, that is the main reason we did well.

im pretty sure i did better than a lot of lee's>. I placed lots of wards, not just for ward hoping. only died once. good cs for jungle and for the time. and for lee bronze elo D: i just dont understand. I have gotten at least 5 A's/A+'s in the past week or two
you have to be better then all other LEEs at your rank/elo/mmr to get an S that is how it is based...
